# Jilo.ai — Full Documentation

> Jilo.ai is a free AI tool directory that helps users discover, compare, and choose the best AI tools. Updated daily with 70+ curated tools across 8+ categories, expert reviews, side-by-side comparisons, and alternative recommendations.

## Website Structure

### Homepage
- URL: https://jilo.ai/en
- Description: Main landing page with search, trending tools, featured tools, AI news feed, and category navigation. Supports English and Chinese (https://jilo.ai/zh).

### AI Tools Directory
- URL: https://jilo.ai/en/tools
- Description: Complete browsable directory of all 70+ AI tools. Filter by category (writing, coding, design, video, business), pricing type (free, freemium, paid), and sort by popularity, newest, or recently updated.
- Individual tool pages: https://jilo.ai/en/tools/{tool-slug}
- Each tool page includes: description, pricing details, features, pros/cons, use cases, and links to alternatives and comparisons.

### Tool Comparisons
- URL: https://jilo.ai/en/compare
- Description: Side-by-side comparison pages for popular AI tools. Each comparison includes feature matrix, pricing comparison, use case recommendations, and verdict.
- Individual comparison pages: https://jilo.ai/en/compare/{comparison-slug}
- Popular comparisons:
  - https://jilo.ai/en/reviews/perplexity-vs-google-vs-chatgpt-search — Perplexity vs Google vs ChatGPT Search
  - https://jilo.ai/en/reviews/cursor-vs-github-copilot-vs-windsurf — Cursor vs GitHub Copilot vs Windsurf
  - https://jilo.ai/en/reviews/claude-vs-gemini — Claude vs Gemini
  - https://jilo.ai/en/reviews/chatgpt-vs-deepseek — ChatGPT vs DeepSeek

### AI Tool Alternatives
- URL: https://jilo.ai/en/alternatives
- Description: Find alternatives to popular AI tools. Each page lists similar tools with feature comparisons and recommendations.
- Individual pages: https://jilo.ai/en/alternatives/{tool-slug}

### Best AI Tools Lists
- URL: https://jilo.ai/en/best
- Description: Curated "best of" lists organized by category and use case.
- Individual pages: https://jilo.ai/en/best/{category-slug}
- Example: https://jilo.ai/en/reviews/best-ai-agents — 10 Best AI Agents 2025

### In-Depth Reviews
- URL: https://jilo.ai/en/reviews
- Description: Expert-written reviews with detailed analysis, scoring, screenshots, and recommendations.
- Individual reviews: https://jilo.ai/en/reviews/{review-slug}

### AI News
- URL: https://jilo.ai/en/news
- Description: Latest AI industry news aggregated from top sources, with summaries in English and Chinese.
- Individual articles: https://jilo.ai/en/news/{news-slug}

### AI Deals
- URL: https://jilo.ai/en/deals
- Description: Current promotions, discounts, and special offers on AI tools.

### Weekly Digest
- URL: https://jilo.ai/en/weekly
- Description: Weekly roundup of the most notable AI tool launches, updates, and trends.
- Individual digests: https://jilo.ai/en/weekly/{week-slug}

## Key Features

1. **Daily Updates**: New tools and reviews added every day
2. **Independent Reviews**: No pay-for-placement; editorial integrity maintained
3. **Use Case Organization**: Tools organized by what you need to accomplish
4. **Free Access**: No registration, no paywalls, no hidden costs
5. **Comparison Engine**: Side-by-side tool comparisons with feature matrices
6. **Alternative Finder**: Discover alternatives to any popular AI tool
7. **Bilingual Content**: Full English and Chinese support
8. **Newsletter**: Weekly AI tool digest delivered to your inbox
